description:
Manages a V2 static route resource within Enterprise Cloud.
~> **Notice** We only support Static Route with service_type "internet" for now.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AwsGwId.description: AWS Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "azure_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id", "internet_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

AzureGwId.description: Azure Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id", "internet_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

Description.description: Description of the Static Route resource.

Destination.description: CIDR this static route points to.

FicGwId.description: FIC Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "azure_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id", "internet_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

GcpGwId.description: GCP Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "azure_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id", "internet_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

InterdcGwId.description: Inter DC Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "azure_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "internet_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

InternetGwId.description: Internet Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "azure_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id" and "vpn_gw_id".

Name.description: Name of the Static Route resource.

Nexthop.description: Next Hop address for specified CIDR.

Region.description:
The region in which to obtain the V2 Network client.
Public ips are associated with accounts, but a Network client is needed to
create one. If omitted, the `region` argument of the provider is used.
Changing this creates a new public ip.

ServiceType.description: Service type for this route. Must be one of "aws", "azure", "gcp", "interdc", "internet" and "vpn".

VpnGwId.description: VPN Gateway on which this static route will be set. Conflicts with "aws_gw_id", "azure_gw_id", "fic_gw_id", "gcp_gw_id", "interdc_gw_id" and "internet_gw_id".
